Pizza Hut Is Making It Extra Easy to Hate Yourself 
The chain is offering 50% off pies until January 9. Most Popular By Sammy Nickalls Jan 3, 2017 It's January 3rd. You've already given up on your New Year's resolution. You're feeling disgusting after all that party food. Well, Pizza Hut is here to make that self-loathing extra poignant this week.   According to a recent statement , the pizza chain is offering 50% off all menu-priced pizza orders that are placed from now until January 9. The stipulations: you must order online or via the app, and the discount only applies to pizzaâ€”no other items, and not the tax, delivery charge, or driver tip. "The weeks after the holiday season can be financially tight for many," David Timm , Chief Marketing Officer of Pizza Hut, said in the statement. "With this quick and easy offer, we're making sure Pizza Hut fans can enjoy the pizza they love without breaking the bank."
